title: Zero Hour
description: The final book. The final mission. The final hour.Â Time's up. Everything Robin has fought for hangs in the balance, and she no longer knows who to trust. But when hiding is no longer an option for Little John, Nathan must put his decades-old plan into motion... whether they are prepared or not.Pre-order the heart-racing conclusion of The Child Thief series now.*Beware of spoilers in the reviews below that are without spoiler alerts*
author: Bella Forrest
